title: Forecasted Weather
description: Forecasted weather conditions for a postal code.

forecast.title: Forecast
forecast.description: Forecasted weather at the time the event was generated.

precipChance.title: Precipitation Chance
precipChance.description: Probability that there will be precipitation (percentage).

precipType.title: Precipitation Type
precipType.description: The form of precipitation that could fall (rain, snow, sleet, etc).

relativeHumidity.title: Relative Humidity
relativeHumidity.description:
The relative humidity of the air, which is defined as the ratio of the amount of water vapor in the air to the amount of vapor required to bring the air to saturation at a constant temperature. Relative humidity is always expressed as a percentage.
Range - 0 to 100.

thunderIndex.title: Thunder Index
thunderIndex.description: Index of the probability of thunderstorms impacting an area. 0 (no thunder to 5 (high risk of severe thunderstorms).

windDirection.title: Wind Direction
windDirection.description:
The magnetic wind direction from which the wind blows expressed in degrees. The magnetic direction varies from 0 to 359 degrees, where 0° indicates the North, 90° the East, 180° the South, 270° the West, and so forth.
Range - 0<=wind_dire_deg<=350, in 10 degree intervals.

kilometersPerHour.title: Kilometers per Hour
kilometersPerHour.description: Wind speed in kilometers per hour

milesPerHour.title: Miles per Hour
milesPerHour.description: Wind speed in miles per hour

kilometersPerHour.title: Kilometers per Hour
kilometersPerHour.description: Wind speed in kilometers per hour

milesPerHour.title: Miles per Hour
milesPerHour.description: Wind speed in miles per hour

uvIndex.title: UV Index
uvIndex.description: Maximum UV index for the 12 hour forecast period.
